# The `ListSeparator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A helper class to return the specified delimiter string after the first invocation of operator StringRef(). Used to generate a comma-separated list from a loop like so: <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ListSeparator</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A helper class to return the specified delimiter string after the first invocation of operator StringRef(). Used to generate a comma-separated list from a loop like so:

<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#ad01bf1fe12c9e7c3ff5cbd2251154109">ListSeparator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28afdd8238d6005774fe2bb9067de76eb8c">LS</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
